a -> 01011001 11001101 11101011 11100010
~a -> 10100110 00110010 00010100 00011101

a = 6 -> 110 (421)
~a -> 001 = 1
~(~a) -> 110 = 6

111111111111111111111111111110 -> x
000000000000000000000000000001 -> ~x

~x = 1


Fast remainder:
27 & (8 - 1) is equal to 00000011 or 3 which is 27 % 8

n & (k-1) -> n%k


n%2==1 -> odd else even

n&1==1 -> odd else even



10101010101

10101010111

00000000010

Exclusive OR ^ EXOR



01011001 11001101 11101011 11100010
00000000 11111111 00000000 00000000
00000000 11001101 00000000 00000000
do AND operation
